GAMEPLAY_EmberBoxDescription.English: A little can with charcoal that can be used to carry some embers.
GAMEPLAY_EmberBoxDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una pequeña lata con carboncillo que puede usarse para transportar ascuas.
GAMEPLAY_EmberBoxDescription.German: Eine kleine Büchse mit Holzkohle, mit der man Glut transportieren kann.
GAMEPLAY_EmberBoxDescription.Russian: Маленькая банка с древесным углем, в которой можно переносить угли.
GAMEPLAY_EmberBoxDescription.Polish: Mała puszka na węgiel drzewny, którą możesz użyć by transportować żar
GAMEPLAY_EmberBoxDescription.Italian: Una lattina contenente carbone che puo' essere usata per trasportare dei tizzoni.
GAMEPLAY_EmberBoxDescription.Japanese: 種火を持ち運ぶために使える木炭入の小さい缶。
GAMEPLAY_EmberBoxDescription.Simplified Chinese: 一个装有木炭的小罐子，可以用来装一些余烬。
GAMEPLAY_EmberBoxDescription.Turkish: Biraz köz taşımak için kullanılabilecek kömürlü küçük bir kutu.

GAMEPLAY_ActiveEmberBox.Japanese: くすぶっている種火入れ

GAMEPLAY_ActiveEmberBoxDescription.English: A little can with some smoldering charcoal.
GAMEPLAY_ActiveEmberBoxDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una pequeña lata con algo de carboncillo ardiente.
GAMEPLAY_ActiveEmberBoxDescription.German: Eine kleine Büchse mit etwas glimmender Holzkohle.
GAMEPLAY_ActiveEmberBoxDescription.Polish: Mała puszka z rozżarzonym węglem drzewnym
GAMEPLAY_ActiveEmberBoxDescription.Italian: Una lattina contenente dei tizzoni bollenti.
GAMEPLAY_ActiveEmberBoxDescription.Japanese: 種火がくすぶっている小さい缶。
GAMEPLAY_ActiveEmberBoxDescription.Turkish: İçinde kömür olan ve için için yanan küçük bir kutu.

GAMEPLAY_BowDrillDescription.English: An ancient way of making fire.
GAMEPLAY_BowDrillDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una forma antigua de hacer fuego.
GAMEPLAY_BowDrillDescription.Italian: Un metodo antico per accendere il fuoco.
GAMEPLAY_BowDrillDescription.Japanese: 古来からの火おこし方法。
GAMEPLAY_BowDrillDescription.Simplified Chinese: 钻木取火，古代人类才会用的方法。

GAMEPLAY_FlintNSteelDescription.English: A piece of scrap metal and a chunk of flint. One of the oldest way to start fires.
GAMEPLAY_FlintNSteelDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una pieza de chatarra y un trozo de pedernal. Una de las formas más antiguas de hacer fuego.
GAMEPLAY_FlintNSteelDescription.Turkish: Bir parça hurda metal ve bir parça çakmaktaşı. Ateş yakmanın en eski yollarından biri.
GAMEPLAY_FlintNSteelDescription.Italian: Un pezzo di metallo e di pietra focaia. Una dei modi più vecchi per accendere un fuoco.
